channel.title: metrics on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in metrics on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: How to do continuous profiling right with Grafana Pyroscope and Ryan Perry, (Grafana Office Hours #27)
item.description:
My friend Paul Balogh and I interview Ryan Perry, co-founder of Grafana Pyroscope, about how to do continuous profiling right. Ryan, and the rest of the Pyroscope team, joined Grafana Labs, where he is now a Director of Engineer. Ryan discusses the main concerns in continuous profiling and how to avoid those pitfalls. Pyroscope is an open-source project for aggregating continuous profiling data about your system’s resources.

Links

  • Pyroscope docs
  • Pyroscope site
  • Pyroscope repo
  • Weigh in on the OpenTelemetry Profiling Data Model

item.title: Combining Frontend and Backend Performance With John Hill (Grafana Office Hours #18)
item.description: In this episode of Grafana Office Hours, my colleagues Marie Cruz, Paul Balogh, and I talk to John Hill, a Web UI Test Engineer and Grafana k6 champion, to talk about how the Grafana and k6 ecosystems can be used to ensure performance in mission-critical applications like NASA’s Open MCT.

item.title: What is Grafana Agent? (Grafana Office Hours #16)
item.description:
What is Grafana Agent? Senior Software Engineer Paschalis Tsilias tells us about what telemetry collectors do, why they’re useful, what you’d have to do without them, and how to get started with Grafana Agent. He is joined by Developer Advocates Nicole van der Hoeven and Paul Balogh.

Useful links

  • Grafana Agent repo
  • Documentation on Grafana Agent

item.title: Agentless Monitoring for Prometheus in Grafana Cloud (Grafana Office Hours #15)
item.description:
Did you know you could do agentless monitoring for Prometheus in Grafana Cloud? Senior Software Engineer Matt Nolf talks to me and my coworker Paul Balogh about the new Metrics Endpoint integration and how you can use it to collect Prometheus metrics from publicly addressable hosts– WITHOUT using Grafana Agent.

Resources

  • Docs
  • Blog post
